stages:
Welcome to dronespace. This is where your story begins.
Since you have managed to come here, you should be familiar with the controls.

** If you have managed to come here...
You're awesome!**

You missed 2'147'483'625 alarms.
You should wake up now!
*** __RING__ *** __RING__ *** __RING__ ***
